00325   void flip_checked_for_av(int s) {
00326     if ( checked_for_av == NULL ) {
00327       checked_for_av = new checked_for_av_type();
00328       checked_for_av->assign( nantivirals, false ); 
00329     }
00330     (*checked_for_av)[ s ] = 1;
00331   }
